# Blog Uno

## Inlined snippet

```javascript
  var some = 'javascript';
```

```jsst
  var a = 'rendered with scriptie-talkie';
```

```python
  some = 'python';
```

## Snippet pulled in
{{ snippet: simple.js }}

```jsst
  var b = 'also';
  var c = 'rendered with scriptie talkie';
```

## Scriptie Talkie Snippet pulled in
{{ scriptie: scriptie.js }}
